mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT EPNO , USR_NM , PDCT_PD_CD /*제품*/ , PDCT_PD_NM /*제품명*/ , PART_NM /*자재명*/ , KIWI_PD_CD , PD_PRP_VAL33 FROM (/*기준상품 기준으로 제품 코드 추출*/ SELECT DISTINCT T2.EPNO AS EPNO , T2.USR_NM AS USR_NM , T4.PD_CD /*기준상품*/ , T4.PD_NM /*기준상품명*/ , T5.OJ_PD_CD AS PDCT_PD_CD /*제품*/ , T6.PD_NM AS PDCT_PD_NM /*제품명*/ , T7.PD_PRP_VAL33 AS PART_NM /*자재명*/ /*, NVL(T6.PD_PRP_VAL33, T4.PD_NM) AS PDCT_PD_NM*/ , T7.PD_PRP_VAL01 || T7.PD_PRP_VAL31 AS KIWI_PD_CD , T3.PD_PRP_VAL09 AS PD_PRP_VAL09 , T3.PD_PRP_VAL33 AS PD_PRP_VAL33 , DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY T5.BASE_PD_CD ORDER BY T5.PD_REL_TP_CD DESC) AS BASE_PD_CD_REL_RAK FROM T_CMY_USR_M T1 INNER JOIN T_CMP_USR_ACO_M T2 ON T2.USR_ID = T1.USR_ID INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T3 ON T3.PD_PRP_VAL09 = T2.RSB_CD /*(웰스 외주상담사의 업체코드 전용 컬럼)*/ AND T3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'SPP' AND T3.PD_CD != 'WP03200002' /*엄광섭 프로님 확인 테스트 자료*/ INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T4 ON T4.PD_CD = T3.PD_CD AND T4.PD_TP_CD = 'P' INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_REL T5 ON T5.BASE_PD_CD = T4.PD_CD AND T5.PD_REL_TP_CD IN ('05' , '18') /*AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '000000' BETWEEN T5.VL_STRT_DTM AND T5.VL_END_DTM*/ INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T6 ON T6.PD_CD = T5.OJ_PD_CD AND T6.PD_TP_CD = 'M' LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T7 ON T7.PD_CD = T5.OJ_PD_CD /*(웰스 외주상담사의 업체코드 전용 컬럼)*/ AND T7.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND T1.BASE_RLE_CD = 'W8030' /*WELLS 상품상담-벤더*/ AND T2.EPNO != '95010' /*한상문매니저님 확인, 해당 업체 사은품 배송 업체, 기준상품 매핑된거는 제외*/ AND EPNO LIKE '95%' AND LENGTH(EPNO) = 5 UNION ALL /*제품 기준으로 제품 코드 추출*/ SELECT T2.EPNO AS EPNO , T2.USR_NM AS USR_NM , T6.PD_CD /*기준상품*/ , T6.PD_NM /*기준상품명*/ , T4.PD_CD AS PDCT_PD_CD /*제품*/ , T4.PD_NM AS PDCT_PD_NM /*제품명*/ , T7.PD_PRP_VAL33 AS PART_NM /*자재명*/ /*, NVL(T6.PD_PRP_VAL33, T4.PD_NM) AS PDCT_PD_NM*/ , T7.PD_PRP_VAL01 || T7.PD_PRP_VAL31 AS KIWI_PD_CD , T3.PD_PRP_VAL09 AS PD_PRP_VAL09 , T3.PD_PRP_VAL33 AS PD_PRP_VAL33 , DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY T5.BASE_PD_CD ORDER BY T5.PD_REL_TP_CD DESC) AS BASE_PD_CD_REL_RAK FROM T_CMY_USR_M T1 INNER JOIN T_CMP_USR_ACO_M T2 ON T2.USR_ID = T1.USR_ID INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T3 ON T3.PD_PRP_VAL01 = T2.RSB_CD /*(웰스 외주상담사의 업체코드 전용 컬럼)*/ AND T3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'SPP' AND T3.PD_CD IN ('WM07100019', 'WM07100020') /*한상문매니저님 확인, 사은품배송 이브자리만 추가*/ INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T4 ON T4.PD_CD = T3.PD_CD AND T4.PD_TP_CD = 'M' LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_REL T5 ON T5.OJ_PD_CD = T4.PD_CD AND T5.PD_REL_TP_CD IN ('05' , '18') /*AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '000000' BETWEEN T5.VL_STRT_DTM AND T5.VL_END_DTM*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T6 ON T6.PD_CD = T5.BASE_PD_CD AND T6.PD_TP_CD = 'P' LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T7 ON T7.PD_CD = T4.PD_CD /*(웰스 외주상담사의 업체코드 전용 컬럼)*/ AND T7.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND T1.BASE_RLE_CD = 'W8030' /*WELLS 상품상담-벤더*/ AND EPNO LIKE '95%' AND LENGTH(EPNO) = 5 ) WHERE 1=1 AND BASE_PD_CD_REL_RAK = '1' AND EPNO = #{session.employeeIDNumber}
mapper.select:
SELECT USR_NM FROM (
) WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM = 1
